mapper.insert: insert into paper (paper_id, title, content, upload_time, upload_user_id, category_id, public, img_url, file_url, author, organize_id) values (#{paperId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{uploadTime}, #{uploadUserId}, #{categoryId}, #{isPublic}, #{imgUrl}, #{fileUrl}, #{author}, #{organizeId})
mapper.select: select ids, paper_id, title, upload_time, upload_user_id, status, approve_remark, approve_time, category_id, public, approve_user_id, author, views, organize_id from paper where paper_id=#{paperId}
